title: Double-Ka-Meetha / Sweet with Bread ğŸ
content:
Ingredients: Bread fry: Bread ğŸÂ slices - 7 to 8 Oil/Ghee - to fry bread slices Rabdi: Milk - 1 litre Sugar - 250 gms Cardamom powder - 1/4 spoon Ghee - 2 tb sp Fried cashew nuts - 1 tb sp Fried golden raisins - 1 tb sp Procedure: Fry Bread:
  • Take bread slices cut into two/four halves like triangle shape
  • Heat oil to fry bread slices low to medium heat
  • Shallow fry
  • You can also deep fry them
  • Take out bread pieces when it becomes golden brown and crispy nature outside
  • Keep them aside
Rabdi:
  • Heat frying pan on medium heat
  • Pour one litre milk
  • Let it boil
  • When boiling add cardamom powder, Ghee and sugar
  • Mix well and stir occasionally
  • Milk content becomes thick and decreases in size
  • Add fried cashew nuts and raisins
  • Then transfer rabdi on fried bread slices
  • Double ka meetha ready to serve ğŸ˜‹ğŸ˜€
  • It's an Indian sweet / Dessert
  • Serve it in bowl @ lunch / Evening snack / festive timeâ˜ºï¸
